techmeme.title: DeepSeek sparked an AI arms race among Chinese asset managers, shaking up China's $10T fund management industry as firms expand AI research and adopt DeepSeek (Reuters)
Sources: SoftBank plans to buy a former Sharp LCD panel plant in Osaka for ~$676M and convert it into a data center for jointly developing AI agents with OpenAI (Nikkei Asia)
Sources: DeepSeek has shown little intention to further commercialize its tech in the near term, instead focusing on model development and building AGI (Zijing Wu/Financial Times)
Terabase, which is developing robots and automated systems using AI tools to rapidly build solar farms, raised a $130M Series C led by SoftBank's Vision Fund 2 (Financial Times)
Flock Safety, a maker of computer vision-enabled video surveillance tech for police and businesses, raised $275M at a $7.5B valuation, up from $4.8B a year ago (Julie Bort/TechCrunch)
